results.title: Eliminating Pornography from Agencies Act
results.committees: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee
results.latest_major_action: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 47.
results.summary: Eliminating Pornography from Agencies Act  This bill directs the Office of Management and Budget to issue guidelines that prohibit accessing a pornographic or other explicit website from a federal computer, except for investigative purposes.
results.summary_short: Eliminating Pornography from Agencies Act  This bill directs the Office of Management and Budget to issue guidelines that prohibit accessing a pornographic or other explicit website from a federal computer, except for investigative purposes.

actions.description: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 47.
Reported by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. H. Rept. 115-81.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
